other_tests.findings: Patient experienced severe depression with a baseline HAM-D score of 31.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient showed steady improvement in depressive symptoms, return to normal sleep patterns, elevation of mood, and increase in energy during treatment. However, symptoms worsened after family discovered treatment, leading to attrition.

other_tests.findings: Patient's clinical course included episodes of insomnia and depressed mood which worsened after familial tensions regarding treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initially improved but later deteriorated leading to discontinuation of treatment 3 days post follow-up.
